蜰蜰蜰

蜰字的基本解释

蜰
féi
即臭虫，身体扁平，赤褐色，腹大，体内有臭腺，吸人、畜的血液。

蜰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［féi］
［《廣韻》符非切，平微，奉。］
［《廣韻》府尾切，上尾，非。］
(1)臭虫。参见“蜰蟲”。
(2)见“蜰蠐”。
[②]［fèi］
［《集韻》父沸切，去未，奉。］
见“蜰2”。

蜰字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蜰； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1087第15
【唐韻】【集韻】?符非切，音肥。【爾雅·釋蟲】蜚，蠦蜰。【註】蜰卽負盤，臭蟲。見蜚字註。　又【韻會】府尾切，音斐。義同。　又【集韻】父沸切，音屝。蜰?，神蛇也。【廣韻】作??。

蜰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蜰字的起名意思

暂无。

Scorpion
Basic explanation of words
Scorpion
féi
Bed bugs, flat, auburn, large abdomen, scent glands in the body, suck the blood of humans and animals.
Scorpion
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［féi］
["Guangyun" Fu Feiqie, Pingwei, Feng. ]
["Guangyun" Fu tail cut, upper tail, non. ]
(1) Bed bugs. See "Ceres".
(2) See "Cervus".
[②]［fèi］
["Jiyun" father is boiling and cutting, Quwei, Feng. ]
See "蜰2".
Scorpion
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蜰; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1087 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Fu Feiqie, sound fat. 【Erya·Release Insects】Fen, worm. [Note] Miscellaneous negative plate, bed bugs. See the note to the character.　[Yunhui] Fuwei cut, Yinfei. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Father boiled and cut, sounded. Yeah? The god snake too. [Guang Yun] for??

Scorpion
Name meaning
Nothing.
féi
только в сочетаниях, см. 蜰虫, 蜰蛴
